## reading in packages & data
```{r}
#| message: false
# general use
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(here)
library(janitor)
library(car)
library(effectsize)
library(rstatix)
library(multcomp)

density_seeded <- read_xlsx(path = here("data", 
                        "density_count veg data.xlsx"))
```

## group up
```{r}
density_seeded_clean <- density_seeded %>% 
  group_by(species, weeding, seeding)
```

# plottin
```{r}
ggplot(density_seeded_clean) +
  aes(x = species , y = count, color = seeding) +
  geom_boxplot() +
 geom_point(position=position_jitterdodge(
   jitter.width = 0,
   jitter.height = 0,
    seed = NULL),
            alpha = 0.3) +
  theme_minimal() +
  #facet_wrap(vars(species)) +
  scale_color_manual(values = c("#FFC567", "#67C0AC", "#B660CD"))
```

## CAME
```{r}
CAME <- density_seeded_clean %>% 
  filter(species == "CAME")

CAME_aov <- aov(count ~ seeding,
                data = CAME)
plot (CAME_aov) ## yea super not normal

kruskal.test(count ~ seeding,
             data = CAME)

dunn_test(count ~ seeding,
             data = CAME) # says seeding isn't a column? i need to move onnnn from this omg

kruskal_effsize(count ~ seeding,
             data = CAME)
```
